description: Run a sub-shell with all Git variables set. This sub-shell can be used to easily interact with the local yadm repository using Git commands. This could be useful if you are using a tool which uses Git directly. More information: https://github.com/TheLocehiliosan/yadm/blob/master/yadm.md#commands.

useCases.description: Run a sub-shell with all Git variables set:
